description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[Fragments in Prose and Verse: by a young lady lately deceased (Elizabeth S- [i.e. Smith]). With some account of her life and character, by the author of “Sermons on the Doctrine and Duties of Christianity” [Miss Henrietta Maria Bowdler].]" Author: SMITH, Elizabeth - Miss, of Burnhall Contributor: BOWDLER, Henrietta Maria. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 12272.f.12." Volume: 02 Page: 2 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1818 Edition: A new edition.
